original_solution_mapping.L1: At the meeting, 200-100=<<200-100=100>>100 people decided to have a snack.
original_solution_mapping.L2: 20 new people came in to snack and the area had 100+20=<<100+20=120>>120 of them eating.
original_solution_mapping.L4: 10 more new people came to join in the snacking so 60+10=<<10+60=70>>70 people were eating.
original_solution_mapping.L5: After 30 people left, 70-30=<<70-30=40>>40 people who were eating remained.
original_solution_mapping.L6: In the end, only 40/2=<<40/2=20>>20 kept eating.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5700.
    Returns: the number of snack eaters left.
    """
    # L1
    total_participants = 200 # 200 people participating
    initial_snack_calculation_subtrahend = 100 # 200-100
    initial_snack_eaters = total_participants - initial_snack_calculation_subtrahend

    # L2
    new_outsiders_joined_first = 20 # 20 new outsiders joined in to have a snack
    current_snack_eaters_after_first_join = initial_snack_eaters + new_outsiders_joined_first

    # L3
    half_divisor_first_departure = 2 # Half of these snack eaters got full and left
    snack_eaters_left_after_first_departure = current_snack_eaters_after_first_join / half_divisor_first_departure

    # L4
    new_outsiders_joined_second = 10 # 10 new outsiders came to have snacks, too
    current_snack_eaters_after_second_join = snack_eaters_left_after_first_departure + new_outsiders_joined_second

    # L5
    snack_eaters_left_second = 30 # 30 more snack eaters got their fill and left
    snack_eaters_after_second_departure = current_snack_eaters_after_second_join - snack_eaters_left_second

    # L6
    half_divisor_final_departure = 2 # half of the remaining snack eaters left later on
    final_snack_eaters = snack_eaters_after_second_departure / half_divisor_final_departure

    # FA
    answer = final_snack_eaters
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: At the meeting, {total_participants}-{initial_snack_calculation_subtrahend}=<<{total_participants}-{initial_snack_calculation_subtrahend}={initial_snack_eaters}>>{initial_snack_eaters} people decided to have a snack.

20 new people came in to snack and the area had {initial_snack_eaters}+{new_outsiders_joined_first}=<<{initial_snack_eaters}+{new_outsiders_joined_first}={current_snack_eaters_after_first_join}>>{current_snack_eaters_after_first_join} of them eating.

10 more new people came to join in the snacking so {snack_eaters_left_after_first_departure}+{new_outsiders_joined_second}=<<{new_outsiders_joined_second}+{snack_eaters_left_after_first_departure}={current_snack_eaters_after_second_join}>>{current_snack_eaters_after_second_join} people were eating.

After {snack_eaters_left_second} people left, {current_snack_eaters_after_second_join}-{snack_eaters_left_second}=<<{current_snack_eaters_after_second_join}-{snack_eaters_left_second}={snack_eaters_after_second_departure}>>{snack_eaters_after_second_departure} people who were eating remained.

In the end, only {snack_eaters_after_second_departure}/{half_divisor_final_departure}=<<{snack_eaters_after_second_departure}/{half_divisor_final_departure}={final_snack_eaters}>>{final_snack_eaters} kept eating.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: At the meeting, 200-100=<<200-100=100>>100 people decided to have a snack.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: 20 new people came in to snack and the area had 100+20=<<100+20=120>>120 of them eating.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: 10 more new people came to join in the snacking so 60+10=<<10+60=70>>70 people were eating.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L5: After 30 people left, 60-30=<<60-30=30>>30 people who were eating remained.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L6: In the end, only 30/2=<<30/2=15>>15 kept eating.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'snack_eaters_left_after_first_departure' (value: 60.0) was used instead of 'current_snack_eaters_after_second_join' (value: 70.0).
